name: This is ### Real
description:
In this game, you and and voice in your head will to get out of the unrecognizable place you find yourself in by switching objects around you between Real and Fake.

*This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

* I didn't have the time to try the Linux version, so I don't really know if it works correctly or not.

*This is my first game so please don't be unreasonably mean, constructive criticism is welcome though.
